```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(mosaic)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
green <- read.csv("GitHub/STA380/data/greenbuildings.csv")
View(green)

ggplot(data=green) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(x=age)) +
  facet_wrap(~green_rating)

green$Bld_Class <- ifelse(green$class_a==1, 'A','B') 

ggplot(data=green) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(x=age)) +
  facet_wrap(~Bld_Class)



```

```{r}

ggplot(data=green) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(x=leasing_rate, bin=10)) +
  facet_wrap(~green_rating)


ggplot(data=green) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(x=leasing_rate, bin=10)) +
  facet_wrap(~Bld_Class)




```
